title: "Anleitung zur magnetischen Heilkunde: Diagnose, Heilkrisen und Massage"
first_phrase: This text is a continuation of a guide on magnetic healing, aimed to familiarize readers with its basic principles and encourage them to use this effective and affordable remedy to provide relief or help within their family and social circles.
